title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 500 - Procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 500 - Procedure

State Regulations
§ 500.1 - Certification and transmittal of minutes
§ 500.2 - When transmittal not required
§ 500.3 - Approval of Governor required

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 500

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§ 1852[3], 1853[2], 1855[4]; Public Officers Law, §87

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
